name: UpdatePartnerService
description:
Partially update a partner service object in HubSpot CRM.

Use this tool to update specific properties of a partner service object identified by `partnerServiceId` in HubSpot CRM. You can also use a unique property value specified by `idProperty`. Only existing, non-read-only properties can be updated. To clear a property, pass an empty string.

parameters.name: partner_service_id
parameters.description: The internal object ID of the partner service to update. Use this to specify the object you want to partially update.

parameters.name: update_properties
parameters.description: JSON object with key-value pairs representing properties to update. Non-existent or read-only properties will cause errors. Use empty strings to clear properties.

properties.description: Key value pairs representing the properties of the object.

parameters.name: unique_property_name
parameters.description: Specify the name of a unique property for the partner service object to identify it. This is used instead of the default internal ID.

value_schema.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

parameters.name: idProperty
parameters.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

value_schema.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

properties.description: Key value pairs representing the properties of the object.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
